name: Private Mears
descriptions: Private Lawrence Mears, serial number 3476511, is a dead soldier found in the cryo lab of Mothership Zeta in 2277.

A key part of the medical squad under Sgt. Daniels, assigned to support the 108th Infantry Battalion, Mears was abducted like the rest when their squad was separated from the main body. Mears was subjected to brutal interrogation by the aliens, but refused to provide anything but his name, rank, and serial number.
Private Lawrence Mears appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.
